title: Who is Julianna Margulies’ Husband? Keith Lieberthal’s Job & Relationship History
description: Discover the love story of Julianna Margulies. Click to learn about their marriage and family life! The post Who is Julianna Margulies’ Husband? Keith Lieberthal’s Job & Relationship History appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Vritti Johar
excerpt: Who is Julianna Margulies' husband? Get the inside scoop on her enduring love story and learn about their marriage and family life.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Curious about who Julianna Margulies‘ husband is? Fans of The Good Wife star are often captivated by her personal life, particularly her enduring love story with her husband. Known for her achievements in both television and film, Margulies’ relationship history is just as intriguing. So, who is Julianna Margulies’ husband? Here’s everything we know about her marriage and family life. Who is Julianna Margulies’ husband? Julianna Margulies is married to Keith Lieberthal. They first met and quickly formed a connection, leading them to marry in November 2007 in Lenox, Massachusetts. The couple welcomed their son, Kieran Lindsay Lieberthal, shortly after, in January 2008. In interviews, Margulies has shared how she felt an instant attraction to Lieberthal, who was unfamiliar with her work as an actress. This allowed their relationship to develop without any preconceived notions, creating a foundation of genuine respect and admiration. What is Keith Lieberthal’s job? Keith Lieberthal is an accomplished lawyer who earned his Juris Doctor from Harvard Law School in 1999. Over the years, he has held prominent roles, including work as a litigator and general counsel. He currently serves as the Head of Americas at Hakluyt & Company, a consulting firm based in London. Lieberthal’s career and achievements establish him as a respected professional, though he is often recognized for his marriage to Margulies. Julianna Margulies & Kieth Lieberthal’s relationship history Julianna Margulies and Keith Lieberthal met in 2006 at a dinner party, an encounter Margulies initially considered a chance meeting (via PEOPLE). They connected instantly, sharing similar values and backgrounds, and six months into dating, she knew he was the one. Margulies recalls feeling deeply understood by Lieberthal, who appreciated her for her genuine self. The couple married in a private ceremony in late 2007, with Margulies pregnant with their son Kieran, who was born in early 2008. Since then, Margulies and Lieberthal have built a loving family, maintaining a strong bond and sharing a life away from the public eye, raising their son with values inspired by both of their heritages.
html:
Curious about who Julianna Margulies‘ husband is? Fans of The Good Wife star are often captivated by her personal life, particularly her enduring love story with her husband. Known for her achievements in both television and film, Margulies’ relationship history is just as intriguing.

So, who is Julianna Margulies’ husband? Here’s everything we know about her marriage and family life.

Who is Julianna Margulies’ husband?

Julianna Margulies is married to Keith Lieberthal.

They first met and quickly formed a connection, leading them to marry in November 2007 in Lenox, Massachusetts. The couple welcomed their son, Kieran Lindsay Lieberthal, shortly after, in January 2008.

In interviews, Margulies has shared how she felt an instant attraction to Lieberthal, who was unfamiliar with her work as an actress. This allowed their relationship to develop without any preconceived notions, creating a foundation of genuine respect and admiration.

What is Keith Lieberthal’s job?

Keith Lieberthal is an accomplished lawyer who earned his Juris Doctor from Harvard Law School in 1999.

Over the years, he has held prominent roles, including work as a litigator and general counsel. He currently serves as the Head of Americas at Hakluyt & Company, a consulting firm based in London. Lieberthal’s career and achievements establish him as a respected professional, though he is often recognized for his marriage to Margulies.

Julianna Margulies & Kieth Lieberthal’s relationship history

Julianna Margulies and Keith Lieberthal met in 2006 at a dinner party, an encounter Margulies initially considered a chance meeting (via PEOPLE).

They connected instantly, sharing similar values and backgrounds, and six months into dating, she knew he was the one. Margulies recalls feeling deeply understood by Lieberthal, who appreciated her for her genuine self.

The couple married in a private ceremony in late 2007, with Margulies pregnant with their son Kieran, who was born in early 2008. Since then, Margulies and Lieberthal have built a loving family, maintaining a strong bond and sharing a life away from the public eye, raising their son with values inspired by both of their heritages.
